artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Velvet batik. Lt. Colored 2.5" - 7" joining swirls on darker bkg. 32" pattern rpt. Cotton velvet Batik. Light colored 2.5"-7" joining swirls on a copper-colored bkg. 32" rpt. Copper Luster
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Larsen Design Studio
portfolio: From The Great Color of ChinaUnknown
text:
Helix, one of the new designs created for the Great Color of China collection,  reinforces the assertion that this collection was about color influence, not design influence, as its imagery was borrowed from ancient Celtic carvings excavated in New Grange and Knowth, Ireland. It is a direct descendant from an earlier fabric, Oberon,  which featured the spiral motif on a sheer casement cloth in the Irish Awakening collection. 

Three colorways of this sumptuous velvet batik were offered: Fawn, Rose Quartz, and Copper Luster. This example, Copper Luster, illustrates the foundation of Larsen's palette for this collection-a soft, pink-toned terra cotta that appears frequently in the Dunhuang murals.
title: Helix
